description: A synchronous motor-driven pump, typically associated with a pumped storage plant.

contents.name: HydroPowerPlant
contents.description: The hydro pump may be a member of a pumped storage plant or a pump for distributing water.

contents.name: RotatingMachine
contents.description: The synchronous machine drives the turbine which moves the water from a low elevation to a higher elevation. The direction of machine rotation for pumping may or may not be the same as for generating.
